<h3 id="X31432">X(31432) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, INCIRCLE, 2nd LEMOINE}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(4*S*a+(a^2+2*(b+c)*a+(b-c)^2)*(-a+b+c))  :  :
